body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

I am facing an issue installing packages on mac using spack with gcc11.2.0,  maybe not correctly installed? because can't find binaries with the below message:

Error: CompilerAccessError: Compiler 'gcc@11.2.0' has executables that are missing or are not executable: ['/usr/local/gfortran/bin/gfortran-11', '/usr/local/gfortran/bin/gfortran-11']

For me /usr/local/gfortran/bin/gfortan is an old build without spack.

I am new to spack and wonder if someone can give a hint or indication on solving this or reinstalling gcc-11.2.0 with spack?.the 

### Information on your system

spack debug report                                      
* **Spack:** 0.17.0-584-e96b91dd37
* **Python:** 3.8.8
* **Platform:** darwin-catalina-ivybridge
* **Concretizer:** clingo

### Additional information

_No response_

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and **@mentioned** any maintainers
- [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue:  netcdf-fortran with gcc11.2.0
